title: Can't access "My Updates" page on NA boards
body:
Hello, I've had this issue for a long while now (had formerly assumed it was normal).  Basically whenever I click on the link in the top right to "My Updates," I get redirected to the main boards page instead.

The only times I get to the page correctly is when I have 30+ replies.

I have a pbe account, and the link has worked fine for me there, so I haven't figured out what may be wrong.

replies.body: This might have something to do with your browser cookies not being saved correctly. Let's see if [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) gets that fixed. If that doesn't seem to help at all, let me know if you're able to view those updates in a different browser.
Clearing my browser history and cookies didn't seem to help.  Nor did switching to a different browser (chrome -> firefox).
I had to do a little digging around in the back-end, but I was able to force your boards profile to re-sync. Let me know if you're still having issues with your updates!

Yeah it's still not working.  Sorry to add all this work for you.

I'll try it out on a completely different computer tomorrow and see if it works there.

Hmmmmm......I don't want to keep you hanging by suggesting some changes and them not work. Let's get you in touch with our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and that way they'll be able to dig much deeper!
Ok thanks for taking the time to try and help.  :)
Didn't work when I tried it on a different computer, which makes sense because it works fine with my pbe account on the pbe boards.

Please if someone can help or connect me to someone who can.  It's really annoying having to look through all my recent posts whenever I see that someone has replied to me, and I am certain that I am missing out on some responses to my older posts.
